Episode.GuestStars: |Kevin Sussman|John Ross Bowie|Megan Heyn|Patrika Darbo|Rebecca Ann Johnson|
Episode.Overview: The guys take a fencing lesson from Barry Kripke and Sheldon finds himself in an awkward position when Kripke expresses interest in Amy. Also, when Stuart struggles to get female customers at the Comic Book Store, Penny, Amy and Bernadette come by to help him out.
Episode.Writer: |Chuck Lorre|Eric Kaplan|Maria Ferrari|Steve Holland|Jim Reynolds|Saladin Patterson|
